author: Laura Saunders
title: How Would the Jeb Bush Tax Plan Affect You?
text:
More than any other presidential candidate, Jeb Bush put forth a plan that dramatically changes the landscape for individual taxpayers.
On the plus side for a taxpayerâ€™s pocketbook, the plan would cut taxes for most, repeal the complex alternative minimum tax, or AMT, and help dual-earner married couples. But the overhaul would also cut mortgage interest deductions for many, eliminate charitable deductions for most and reduce the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
